This store is just an eBay front with no quality control over the products they ship. Essentially, you pay them more money for them to find the same cheaper product on eBay and purchase it from the seller. I bought a “Refurbished“ PS Vita from this site which was fulfilled by a third party eBay seller. The third party seller at no point disclosed that the console did not include a charger, original box, or anything. All I got was the console. The console was packaged poorly and sustained damage during shipping. The console was in a thin bubble wrap envelope that would only protect it from minor impacts but not from being dropped or handled roughly (you know, things that happen during shipping). There were no indications that the package was fragile.“All sales are final” and all returns must be filed within 14 days... it takes 14 days to receive your package with how slow shipping is. Even if it arrives before then, customer service is non-existent, so good luck even initiating a return. Even if you get to return your purchase, they don’t give refunds for returns, only store credit. They are scamming you out of your money. You would be better off buying directly from an eBay seller for a cheaper price. That way, you know exactly what you are getting.

I'm a collector and ordered Dragon Quest VIII on PS2. The condition said New. Anytime I wrote to ask questions (via Gmail and Facebook) I never received feedback, other than a few auto-responses to my gmail. I ordered anyways, seeing I understand backlogs, life, etc. Businesses get busy. What I received in the mail was a re-wrapped/resealed game, without the cover sleeve over top of the case (because this game came with one originally when it was actually new). When I opened it, there was no insert for the Final Fantasy XII demo inside, so this copy definitely isn't a complete copy. The worst part is the discs are all scratched up and it took me around 3 tries to finally get the game to play correctly. This is NOT a game in NEW condition and I DO NOT appreciate the misleading information. If it was advertised as mostly complete in fair/used condition, then I might've kept my expectations not so high, as well as, I would've never paid the price I paid. When you advertise something as NEW, people expect it to be NEW/SEALED, or VERY close, MINT condition even, but it wasn't. Yes, I bought out of my own discretion and I also understand that sometimes things happen. Businesses aren't always going to have a 100% perfect wrap sheet. Accidents happen, but I really feel like someone dropped the ball on this one.

Review.Titre: Be wary when doing business with this company.
Review.Contenu: I pre-ordered a new game on May 2. "Pre-Order" means I expect to receive the game on or before the date I can go buy the game in the store (May 30). I periodically checked the website for the order status, which always said, "Order processing". Well, on May 29, I still didn't have the game, so I contacted the company through their website (order status still said it was processing), asking for shipping info...no response. On May 30, I called and left a voicemail asking about my order...no response. That evening, I canceled the order so I could go to the store to buy the game...no response. Six days later, the game shows up in the mail.  Now I have to decide if I'm going to ship this back to them at my own expense or just sell the game on Craigslist. I am staying away from Players Choice! UPDATE: In response to this review, the company contacted me to return the game at their expense and refunded my money. Dave has been polite and responsive. I just wish this had been the case right up front. I still wouldn't recommend this company if you need your order by a certain date, but if you are flexible on when it arrives, they might be okay to work with.

I recently bought a genesis and sega cd (I'm one of the people that actually enjoyed this system for the adventure games) and was very impressed by the selection of games that Players Choice offered.  It almost seemed too good to be true and unfortunately, three weeks after placing my order, I am afraid that it was. Two weeks after placing the order, I finally received a shipment but only half of the games I ordered were there along with a post-it note informing me the rest of my games would ship soon.  I found this to be a somewhat unprofessional way of communicating this to me.  An email or phone call would have been better.  Also, one of the games is scratched and unplayable and another game in a generic CD case without any instruction manuel (I was never informed the game would arrive this way). This is not to mention that I have sent them numerous emails asking about the return policy and to check on the status of my shipment and have received exactly ZERO responses! To Players Choice: are you guys reading these reviews?  Because if you are, you should notice that your customer service is being called into question over and over.  I would love to be a repeat customer so work on this!

Review.Titre: Good prices, but shipping takes forever and customers service lied to me, flat-out.
Review.Contenu: I found a game I'd been looking for, new, for a good price, and placed an order on a Friday afternoon.  I checked the site on Tuesday and my order was still 'Processing', so I used the contact form to ask how many business days it takes to process an order before it ships. I received an email Wednesday stating that my order had shipped and should arrive in three to five days, with no further information.  A follow-up message asking for tracking information went unanswered. Today, the following Monday (six days after the 'three to five days' window; ten days after placing the original order), my order status on the web site changed to 'Shipped', and the tracking system shows that it had indeed not shipped until this afternoon.  The person who said it had already shipped had given me false information and did not acknowledge further inquiries.  I find this to be unacceptable and I will hesitate to order from this company in the future, despite the quite reasonable prices they offer. Taking a full week to 'process' an order before it ships is an whole other conversation - particularly since they accepted payment immediately, but would be excusable if a fair expectation was presented as part of the ordering process.
Took very ever to receive my package and Controller was brock.

Review.Titre: Fast and cheap, but not great quality.
Review.Contenu: I purchased a copy of Mega Man Legends for the Playstation, to give some context.The speed at which it shipped was good, I have no complaints with how soon it arrived.However, Players Choice Videogames did not properly inform me of the shipping progress.  I got a shipping link well after I bought the game, and when I clicked on it, I got an error message.  But I can't pin this on PCV too precisely, and I got it quickly, so I'm not especially bothered by this detail.The price was nice, about the price I would like to buy this game at today.  Games from the fifth gen are more expensive than they used to be, so it's nice to finally experience a generation from before my time at a reasonable price.However, I've only played fifteen minutes and have problems with the quality.  For one, the opening sequence is glitched due to a scratched disc.  It runs fine until a certain point, then the voice audio starts to loop at the wrong line before cutting out entirely.  Then the cutscenes have consistent stuttering, not enough to completely ruin them, but anyone who loves the game will hate it, and I can't feel confident my experience is being negatively impacted by a low quality product.The disc is really scratched, which is a very uncomforting realization since the case came plastic-wrapped.  I realize that a game doesn't have to be new to come in the plastic, but it's such a common thought.  I'd rather the game had come in just the box, because this seems deceptive, intentionally or not.This is a small point, but when I buy a game where the website displays a specific box-art, I expect the case that holds the box art on the site.  What I mean is that the website lists the box art for MML in the CD case- the one with the awkward-looking 3D render.  But instead, I got a DVD-style case that looks more like it fits in my PS2 collection.  Again, this is a nitpick, but it means if I want this game to not stick out in my collection, I gotta buy another case with the art I expected.  Little inconveniences like this should be avoided.To recap, I'm giving PCV a 2/5 because I got a low-quality product that, while it works semi-decently now, could very well fall apart in a very short time.  If they could mention the quality of the game on their website, or if they could just up the quality of their copies, this should be a non-issue since I would know exactly what I was buying.  The other details were worth metnioning in my eyes, but not worth docking further points on their own.

I couldn’t be on it for more than like a few minutes before it would shut off from overheating. I contacted Players Choice and David offered a replacement one which works fine. Well I guess the only issue is that the controller that came with it doesn’t really work, nor did the one that came with the first PS3 I got, but I just use the PS3 controller I originally got from players choice which, again works fine.All in all I guess the only real cons I have with buying from Players Choice is that some items take a while to ship, even when like realistically you’d think they’d be shipped about faster than they were, and like it’ll say it “shipped” on the site on a date before it actually shipped, and the controllers that come with the consoles that get shipped to you may not work properly.(Mine didn’t) but like other than that, the site is legit you get the products you order which generally work fine, and if you get a product that doesn’t work you can just contact them about it and they’ll replace it with one that does, so there’s not really a hassle in that area.All in all, I was definitely satisfied with my service here and it’s a pretty great site to order stuff from that aren’t usually on the gaming market anymore.
Fast shipping, however 1 of the 5 cases has a weak clip

Review.Titre: I found all of the old games loved when…

Ordered ds game for my son. Order was here in about 10 days. Package was clean and undamaged; and no glitches 🙂✨Only one suggestion - would be nice to have a time line for delivery - wasn't able to see tracking until week after order was placed.  Would order from them again❗

Game arrived in good condition. The tracking number I had for my order was not working for me but after emailing the site I had a very fast response and update. The game came with a manual that was a bit banged up on the cover page but in good condition everywhere else. The game disc had rings and streaks, likely from cleaning, but was easily wiped off with a glasses cleaning cloth. Overall pleased with the product, good price and fast customer service.

As a video game collector, and first time ordering from the site, I was nervous with the reviews and such. I ordered 3 games that I hoped were authentic. 2 out of 3 games were, and I had a problem with the third game as it did not load properly up to my console; I emailed the customer support, and they got back to me within a day of the issue. They are a great service for first time use, and I am happy with my purchase. And I am pleasantly surprised that they were willing to help, so 4/5 stars.

Got my game shipped to me sooner than expected. It came wrapped in what was obviously aftermarket plastic. Not sure why. The disc appeared to be in good condition. It appeared to have been cleaned but a residue was leftover showing the wiping motions. Cleaned it myself and the game only froze once so far on the second loading screen during gameplay.

This company doesn't waste time. You order and they will have it sent to you within 3-5 business days. I ordered two games from them and received them in perfect condition. I will definitely be ordering some more items from this website. Thank you.

Review.Contenu: prices are very fair and the service was ok i purchashed a game and called ahead of time to make sure cause i wanted to make sure it had everything in it cause i like keeping them in near mint to mint condition i was told that it was complete. when they replied to my email asking the same question i was told it was missing the instruction manual which i am greatly disappointed about. but so far everything else about them is great

Review.Titre: Had what I wanted, got it quick!
Review.Contenu: I ordered SOCOM: U.S. Navy Seals from this company. They had it in stock, new, for $3.99 with $6.99 for shipping. The product was shipped quickly, and was shrink wrapped to look like new. I know the difference between a DVD case and a PS2 case, so when I opened it up, it was in a DVD case (was missing the PS2 memory card holder.) No matter, the game was in almost perfect condition, and it was at a great price. I would definitely order from this company again.

Review.Titre: Decent treatment and very little friction
Review.Contenu: We ordered a PlayStation 2 game the other day. The disc was so scratched that we couldn't play it. After we sent an email to them telling what happened, they replied (in only one day) saying that the game is going to be replaced. A week later the game came (like new) and they sent an email making sure we received the replacement ok.So... Not the best or worst experience, but at the end you guys were fair and helpful. The customer service was great! Thank you Players Choice Videogames.

I received a quick response to my order. I was pleased with the quick turnaround on my order. My only issue is that it was not mentioned if the gaming system I was purchasing was used. When I received my order the system was not in it's original box.  In fact it was not in a box at all except ,of course the box it was shipped in.

They have a great selection of games at a great price as well as replacement game cases, which I haven't found at a good price elsewhere. Also, their site is very well organized and has a good aesthetic. It's a great site and I plan to buy from their site more.

I was looking everywhere for THPS3 for Xbox original and couldn't find it. A simple google search sent me here and it was only a few dollars. Fast shipping and the disc was in great shape! If your playing on a Xbox 360 you may have to change your video settings to 480p. Will be ordering more games soon!

I bought some universal game cases for my SNES games. At first I was unable to see if they shipped and were on their way, but they got here in due time. They were very responsive to customer service questions when I was curious about my order. I'm a big fan of not having to buy these cases in the bulk stock of 100, that's a lot! The cases arrived in okay shape - a small chip off the corner on one - but nothing that is glaring or would get in the way of them serving their aesthetic purpose for me. I'll probably buy more in the future.

The gaming community has blown up in recent years. With big budget games coming out every month and the boom of retro gaming, finding a decent place to buy your games can be hard to find. These guys have decent prices and a great selection. Always worth trying someone out once to see if you like em

I bought a single PS4 jewel case after losing one in a move. I appreciated the option to only buy one, as opposed to most other sites that required bulk purchases. Everything seemed to ship and arrive in a fairly quick manner and if I ever need something like this again, I would go straight to PCV.

This is a very nice replacement for the original controllers for the SNES system. Great for getting back into retro gaming and not having to worry about all that button mashing on older controllers (or worrying about where your old controllers are). Feels like the original. No sticky buttons.

Review.Titre: Just be prepared to wait a few weeks
Review.Contenu: Took a while for the game to ship to my location. But the wait was worth it. Game came in pristine condition! Would highly recommend Players Choice Videogames again. Just be prepared to wait a few weeks, or even a month, before you can expect your item to arrive.

Review.Titre: Best bang for your buck for trade-in value.
Review.Contenu: This site is the best way to get trade in value for your used games. They will accept almost any game as opposed to other sites. The only negative is the processing time (around 2 to 3 weeks). If you are willing to wait it out, this is a great place to buy and sell your used games!

Review.Titre: Problems at 1st but they were resolved
Review.Contenu: I purchased a PS2 from these guys only for it to fail 2 days later after playing it only once. Reached out to them about it and they sent a replacement power adapter but it did not work either showing that the PS2 console was the problem. They did send the adapter free of charge and responded to my emails in a timely manner.Once I told them that the console was the problem, they sent me another console free of charge and it has been working correctly since I received it. It took some time but in the end I did get what I paid for. Appreciate these guys resolving the issue like they did.

Review.Contenu: We purchased a Wii game at Christmas and could not get it working.  Once David was aware of the issue he was quick to make it right and sent us a new game.  My boys are much happier now that they are able to play their video game.  Thank you!

i was dieing to find wrgames defcon one for a great price but every where i went i could not find it for a resonable price. then i stubled along this place and it was cheap so i ordered it and it is awsome this website truly is a good one to shop for old video games

The items did have to be shipped in two separate parcels, which were a few days apart. Not quite sure the reasoning for this, but they do have USPS trackers on them, so I’m confident the second package will arrive with no setbacks. David with the sales team has been responsive and easy to communicate with. I definitely plan on getting more games, especially while the world is in quarantine!

Today I received my purchase. In all, it took 8 business days for my order to be received. I contacted Playerschoicevideogames.com because my order seemed to be stalemate, showing in processing although the payment was completed. I called and left a message on voice mail, but because my purchase was an intended gift, I also emailed my inquiry along with the explanation that it was a birthday gift to my grandson. I was advised it was on the way and would arrive in 3-5 days. The next business day I received a tracking number as well. I have to say that it was received in time and within the 5 business days as advised in the email response. Quite different from the postings I have read on here. I believe that this company is working on better service, and I am thankful that they were able to provide my game to give to my grandson in time.

Purchased a ton of SNES games from Playerschoicevideogames.com during the holidays.  Their prices averaged to about 7 bucks a game, after tax.  Local  dealers wanted at least 12-20 bucks for these titles.  Will definitely buy from this place again.  My only issue with the web site is that it lists games that are not currently in stock.  They should not show up when doing searches for games. Response to AnGiroux Cressman' comment:Here is an example of my issue. I want to purchase some SNES games "today".  When I do a search for all SNES games, I get around 24 pages of games to look thru.  While I am reviewing these games, I notice that 7-8 pages are filled with games that are currently not available.  I would like to view only games that are in stock.  This option is currently not available.  I am not interested in the price of a game that is not in stock because it may change once it becomes available again.  If I am going to trade-in an item, I know exactly what it is and will search for that one item, rather than looking thru a long list.

Now, everything showed up, everything works good minus the controller that the gamecube came w/ but I don't like that I don't get my tracking number until I've contacted them that's the only issue I have. They were nice & sent me the info that I needed,but, other than that everything came, I got what I have purchased, games work & look good too. I'm so happy I got them & the website is actually legit, you get what you picked & payed for. It seem scary & a bit doubty but trust me it is what the website says it is, the customer service is great plus this website has more options in games & consoles in my opinion. If I had to rate it I'd be 4.5 stars out of 5 thank you guys so much for my orders.

Review.Titre: The website is easy to navigate
Review.Contenu: The website is easy to navigate. The game condition was exactly as described. The prices are very reasonable. Will tell anyone who asks me about the best websites, to choose Players Choice. Keep up the good work.. Cynthia Sweigart

I ordered several Atari and Sega games, they were delivered in a timely fashion and in good condition. Some titles were unavailable so there was a refund for them in the box. I didn't get my Order Number initially but I got a quick response when I sent in an email. Always one of my go-to Retro game stores for fair prices and quick turnaround!

I ordered two old PS2 games for my brother. They were the perfect gift, but I honestly didn't expect them to arrive before Christmas since I only ordered them a week before - they wound up arriving just in time, though! I was super impressed with the shipping speed and the quality of the games, too. Definitely a legit site, and has some cool finds :)

Review.Titre: Players Choice Video Games: an Excellent Company
Review.Contenu: Awesome products and wonderful service!  Will buy from this great company again!!  My package was processed and delivered on time!  Customer service replied when they said they would… I recommend Players Choice to everyone looking for game consoles and games. A great choice to go for birthday and holiday presents!

I’ve made two orders in this website now and recently almost made a third. I had to cancel however because I didn’t realize I had two of the same product in my cart. After about 20 min sending an email to customer support about canceling, they responded and gave me a full refund. You can trust this website along with the people.

Shopping was easy, and the selection was decent based on the used games market. I was really impressed with the shipping and packaging, I had to double check that I bough a used game beforeI opened the packaging. Very professional.

Ordered a Wii for our special-needs daughter who is familiar only with this gaming platform, and Players Choice came thru in timely manner and just as ordered and promised. Really well done and most deeply appreciated!

I was not expecting game cases, let alone cases in mint condition. One of them even had a manual! the discs were in excellent condition. When it comes to buying the games i used to play as a kid, I recommend shopping at Players Choice over anything else.

Review.Titre: My experience with Player's Choice was…
Review.Contenu: My experience with Player's Choice was fantastic. I got exactly what I was looking for, at a price far cheaper than I could find anywhere else. I had an issue with my email confirmation, but customer service was easy to get ahold of, and was able to clear up the issue immediately. Shipping was very quick, and the product came in excellent condition. I would feel very confident in buying from Player's Choice again.

Delivery was not near as long as I had originally thought. Also for a simply refurbished game that most places ask more than double the price I paid, it's in fairly good condition compared to others I've seen.

Received item in about 6 days, came brand new with plastic wrapping on box. I have to be honest, I was going to get the digital download,  but buying from these guys even with shipping was better deal!

Recently was scrolling through YouTube, and saw this website. Ordered two items, a game and a controller, was worried when I only received one of the two items. Emailed them and got a quick response, reassuring me that I will get both of my orders. The next day, my second item arrived, couldn’t have been happier with the service and the mail time. Well deserved 5 stars!

When I received the game that I ordered it was scratched to death and needless to say I was not impressed. After I contacted customer service to see if we could do anything about my recent purchase they allowed me to return the game and exchange it for a great looking game! Barely a scratch. Perfect resolution, happy customer here
I was super happy to play an old game from my childhood. I would very much recommend this for everyone

I ordered a game system from Player's choice, and had a few issues. They were quick to respond to my questions, and fixed things very quickly. Everything worked out better than I could have hoped. David has been so extremely patient, and helpful. This company definitely has my thumbs up 😃 Thank you Player's choice!

Review.Titre: The proves was good and good customer…

I bought a Dreamcast from them and they were nice enough to through in a few extra games which is something they didn't have to do. Buy from them, they will go above and beyond for you.

Review.Titre: The first console never made it to me…
Review.Contenu: The first console never made it to me but boy when y’all sent that second console amazing completely worth it I even got two extra games for the wait lit assassins creed games 💯🔥

First I just have to say what awesome customer service! I had issues with the tracking link in my order email so I sent them an email asking about my order. I have never had such a quick response from any company! I was sent a working tracking number and was told in the email when my order will be delivered, AND to email them back when I received it. This company truly cares about their customers. I received my GameCube console and games, all in working order!Second, what a selection! The fact that I can still find classic games and consoles, not just the "newest" ones. Something that a game store such as GameStop can't even provide. This is my new "go-to" for anything gaming related.

Review.Titre: My Experience with a new gaming website
Review.Contenu: I was so excited when I found just dance 2014 for xbox 360 because every other website was too expensive!!! But when I went to players choice they had one left so I knew I had to get it!!!! I love how you can track your order!!! My order came before it was supposed to come and it works great!!!! I am definitely going to tell my friends if you want a website that has all your favorite games for affordable prices go to playerschoice.com!!!! Thank you players choice you are awesome and I will definitely by a lot of things from your site in the future!!!!

I placed an order on November 22 with this company. A couple of days later I emailed customer service with a question about my order. Within twelve hours, I had a reply. The game arrived in like new condition and timely. Will definitely search for more items from them. Very satisfied!

LOVED!  Been replacing some of the legacy games that were destroyed! Super glad i can keep the games going! thank you for your service!! Great customer service - quick response and great selection at a wonder price!! Thank you!

Review.Titre: You found the right place to buy from! Excellent all around from their communication to the actual condition of the products they sell! 5/5 stars good job guys! Keep it up!
Review.Contenu: Great prices for hard to find items. Items are shipped as soon as payment clears. I've ordered video games so far and all of them have flawless discs we're talking no scratches or any other damage. They always play. I think one out of several USED games I've bought had very few and very minor scratches but plays with absolutely no problem. If you are buying something USED it will not be in NEW condition. 5/5 or 10/10 stars for you guys. Your communication is great. Everything I have purchased from you guys have been in excellent condition which is surprising considering the age and previous use they've endured over the years. Buy from them! I've shopped around online and they are very competitive with their prices and shipping and their overall selection. Their prices are very competitive and they have products that can be very hard to find. You will not regret it. If you're unsure, buy here. You will like what you recieve. I will always buy whatever gmaes/consoles/ etc I want from here. Congratulations on finding the right place to purchase from!

Well, not to brag, but I had received a complete, sealed copy of Super Mario Bros. Wii and LOVED IT!!! I cannot wait until May to get my next game at the Players Choice Videogames website. You are all awesome sauce!

First and foremost; I am not the social media type, I hardly ever leave a review on anything. but people are quick to complain. I am quick to give a compliment. I have been searching for the games at a reasonable price for a while I searched everywhere. I was starting to get disappointed but then I came across this site. I had never heard of you. and I was skeptical but I decided to put it in Gods' hands and order these. when they came I was so happy you truly don't know how much joy you gave me. I don't ask for much and I am a christian who understands that small things matter just as much as big things. Thank you so much God loves you and I do to. I will order from this site again.

I ordered a copy of NCAA 08 and it works pretty good! The game came in after a few days and I had no issues at all, besides from the fact you need an account to track your item. It's very reliable and I recommend using this website for retro games.

Upon request, they gave me my list of items purchased while I was waiting on two more items to arrive. If they can make it a standard to give you an items list with your receipt, that would be awesome! Really great response time and quality of products! Will be buying again soon :3
